1.name: Press The Attack
1.description: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals bonus adaptive damage and makes them take increased damage from all sources.

2.name: Lethal Tempo
2.description: After attacking a champion, gain bonus attack speed and increase your attack speed cap for a duration.

3.name: Fleet Footwork
3.description: Moving and attacking builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants bonus move speed.

4.name: Conqueror
4.description: Basic attacks and abilities grant stacks of adaptive force. At max stacks, heal for a portion of damage dealt to champions.

1.name: Absorb Life
1.description: Killing a minion or monster heals you for 1-23 (based on level).

2.name: Triumph
2.description: Scoring a takedown heals you for 2.5% of your max health (+ 5% of your missing health) and grants you an additional 20 gold.

3.name: Presence of Mind
3.description: Takedowns restore a portion of your maximum mana or energy.

1.name: Legend: Alacrity
1.description: Gain 3% bonus attack speed per takedown .

2.name: Legend: Tenacity
2.description: Gain tenacity from takedowns (reduces crowd control effects).

1.name: Coup de Grace
1.description: Deal increased damage to low-health enemy champions.

2.name: Cut Down
2.description: Deal bonus damage to champions with more max health than you.

3.name: Last Stand
3.description: Deal increased damage while you are low on health.
